mapper.select: select * from board order by no desc limit #{startNum}, #{postPerPage}
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, writer, pwd, content) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{pwd}, #{content})
insert into memberpoint(userid, howmuch, why) values(#{userid}, #{howmuch}, #{why})
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where no=#{no}
